thread.title: Tustins Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker, First Team Estates Christies International, Shoots And Scores With Landmark Sale Of Estate Belonging To Anaheim Ducks Star
thread.title_full: Tustins Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker, First Team Estates Christies International, Shoots And Scores With Landmark Sale Of Estate Belonging To Anaheim Ducks Star - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tustins Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker, First Team Estates Christies International, Shoots And Scores With Landmark Sale Of Estate Belonging To Anaheim Ducks Star
text:
OC Register Reports On Fast Work By Expert First Team Estates Christie's International Agent Nancy Aynehchi To Help Create a $2.95 Million One-Of-A-Kind Transaction Of Anaheim Ducks’ Francois Beauchemin’s Home To Ducks Fans.
Tustin, CA (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
First Team Estates Christie’s International has shot and scored for a family of fans of the Anaheim Ducks who were in the market for a luxury estate in the Tustin area.
“Our agents are trained to work closely with buyers and understand their needs, their interests, and where they are going long term,” explained Mark Hughes, Chief Operating Officer, First Team Estates Christie’s International . “Nancy Aynehchi did that in an incredible way for her buyers and the result was a one-of-a-kind sale!”
As reported in the Orange County Register, Nancy Aynehchi was reading the Register’s real estate section on the estate in Tustin Ranch, which mentioned that the owner was Anaheim Ducks’ star Francois Beauchemin.
“My clients are big, big Ducks fans,” Nancy Aynehchi explained to reporter Marilyn Kalfus. “When I read your articleI immediately emailed it to my client," said Aynehchi of a story on the house that appeared in the Register on the Real Estate blog. "Once my client read the article, she was so impressed that she asked me to prepare an offer.”
Once the transaction was completed, the OC Register once again wrote about the sale, including the $2.95 million sale price, a landmark for the Tustin Ranch area.
“Nancy did a fantastic job putting together an opportunity for her buyer to have all the available information on the estate property so that they could act quickly,” said Mark Hughes. “Congratulations to her and to the buyer, the seller, and as always, go Ducks!”
For more information on the reporting by the Orange County Register on the 5,500 square foot estate situated on a half acre in Tustin Ranch, CA, go to http://www.ocregister.com/lansner/ranch-684593-francois-house.html
ABOUT FIRST TEAM ESTATES CHRISTIE’S INTERNATIONAL
First Team Estates Christie's International specializes in selling Orange County's most unique and exclusive properties. As part of the luxury division of Southern California's most trusted real estate company, First Team Real Estate, First Team Estates Christie's International has been recognized for its unparalleled level of service for estate buyers and international buyers in major media in Asia and the United States. In 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and now 2015, First Team Estates Christie's International was recognized as ‘Best of OC’ for Real Estate Companies by the annual Orange County Register survey of 100,000 Southern California households. We can be reached at (888) 236-1943 or at firstteam.com .
